data.message: Hello! Facebook! Happy New Year To You!  I need some help from you guys!  I need to change one of my fan page name to a new name! I have tried so many times to request a new page name change and it never work. I have also tried to contact FB for help and got no responses at all! So I thought I should try here!  SO FB PLEASE HELP!

replies.message: Hey Katherine. Learn how you can change your Page name in our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/271607792873806?sr=1&query=change%20page%20name&sid=0ExO51fWPHpwjGl9T. Hope this helps! -Sarah
